backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, booking leads, and rate card upload with access control and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing updates to the frontend rate card display and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short functional descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens and styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing authentication state and routing between login, booking, leads, and rate card pages.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation, logout handling, and responsive mobile/desktop navigation.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Simple component rendering square or wide variants of the BISMI CABS logo.
frontend/src/components/RatePricingSecti: Component displaying multiple pricing sections including current rates, additional info, local transfer, and rental rate card tables/cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that constructs an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, status tracking, and restoring identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch and mutate booking leads, rate cards, and admin status using an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and custom theme variables for light and dark modes with cab service branding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BookingFormPage.tsx: Implements a booking form with validation, submission via mutation, and authentication gating.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Displays authenticated booking leads with loading, error handling, and formatted lead details.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen using Internet Identity and provides navigation options after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/RateCardPage.tsx: Provides a rate card page with authentication, file upload using progress tracking, and download functionality, plus admin checks and pricing display.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Creates a blob from bytes and triggers a browser download via a temporary link.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing parameters from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing implemented features, versioning, and current state of the BISMI CABS website.
